title: Gamification-Based Military Trauma Management Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic military medical knowledge and trauma assessment experience
context.additional_context: Aimed at enhancing decision-making skills in resource-limited environments, with an emphasis on team-based collaboration simulations. Learners train under pressure similar to real-world scenarios using VR and interactive scenario tools.

learning_goals: Perform three-tier triage with 90% accuracy in resource-constrained settings.
Collaborate with team members to apply major trauma treatment protocols within 15 minutes via a gamification simulation.
Develop a strategy to improve virtual patient survival rates by 20% based on simulation results and submit it as a portfolio.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
